mapper.select: select member_no, password, kor_name, eng_name, phone, jumin, email, address, photo, admin, uniqueness from member where member_no=#{memberNo}

insert into Member(member_no, password, kor_name, eng_name, phone, jumin, email, address, photo, admin, uniqueness) values(#{memberNo}, #{password}, #{korName}, #{engName}, #{phone}, #{jumin}, #{email}, #{address}, #{photo}, #{admin}, #{uniqueness});
